All videos are available to download so you can study and learn offline. I answer all questions on the discussion board and am always here to help. This course will continually receive more videos as I return to training for the 110 hurdles. If there are any topics you would like me to cover in future courses please let me know in the discussions or via private message.

I look forward to hearing of your success and I look forward to speaking with you!

-Coach Cotto
title: Hurdling - How to Run Faster
